# Divipy

## Installation

Use the package manager [pip](https://pip.pypa.io/en/stable/) to install Divipy

```diff
pip install -i https://test.pypi.org/simple/ divipy
```

## Import

```python
import divipy
```

## Use

```python
from divipy import sum
sum(1,50)

# >> 51
```
[View more examples](https://github.com/pandaxyz-xd/divipy/examples)
